name: swarm.at Settlement Protocol
description: Git-native settlement protocol for AI agent swarms. Validates actions against institutional rules, settles them to a hash-chained ledger, and manages trust-tiered agent identities.

skills.name: Settle Action
skills.description: Validate a proposed action against institutional rules. Returns a settlement token and ledger hash if approved.
examples: Settle a research finding with 0.95 confidence
Validate a code review action before committing

skills.name: Check Settlement
skills.description: Query ledger status for a previously settled action by task ID or hash.
examples: Check if task research-001 was settled

skills.name: Ledger Status
skills.description: Get the current state of the settlement ledger including latest hash, entry count, and chain integrity.

skills.name: List Blueprints
skills.description: Browse available workflow blueprints. Filter by tag (audit, code-review, research).

skills.name: Fork Blueprint
skills.description: Fork a blueprint into an executable workflow molecule with step-by-step execution.

skills.name: Get Credits
skills.description: Check an agent's credit balance for workflow operations.

author: Mediaeater

pricing.details: Free tier available. Credit-based billing for workflow blueprint execution.
